name: Hope/Remember
description:
It's the week of Halloween and you don't have a date for the school's party on Saturday! But there is Hope, who is coincidentally the most popular girl in town. Unfortunately, there's is also another threat looming in the horizon.

Explore the town, talk to people and get the girl in this story-driven adventure with art ripped off from inspired by old school RPGs such as the early Ultima games. 

Soundtrack

You can find the soundtrack here: https://soundcloud.com/purplelum/hope-remember

Walkthrough

There's a walkthrough in the Downloads if you want just to experience the story without getting bogged down by the puzzles.

Note

This time the art is made by me, so don't be surprised if it doesn't exactly eclipse the previous LD entries on my page!
